bug.short_desc: dnf won't explain conflicts even with --best
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
I run "dnf update" and I get this error:
Skipping packages with conflicts: (add '--best --allowerasing' to command line to force their upgrade): google-noto-emoji-fonts noarch 20170426-1.fc24 updates 4.6 M
I have no idea where the dependence on emoji fonts came from or what it conflicts with, so I run:
dnf --best update
I get nothing explaining the conflict, in fact all mention of google-noto-emoji-fonts simply disappears.
I add --allowerasing and get the same thing.
I try plain old dnf update again, and the emoji font complain comes back.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): dnf-1.1.10-4.fc24.noarch
How reproducible: At the moment, with the metadata on my system, 100%. Who knows what it will be like tomorrow...
Steps to Reproduce: 1. see above 2. 3.
Actual results: Error which it refuses to explain that disappears when asked for an explanation.
Expected results: I'd really like to know what the heck that package conflicts with (how do you even make a font package with conflicts :-).
Additional info:
Here's the transcript of my attempts this morning:
[root@tomh ~]# dnf update Last metadata expiration check: 2:55:10 ago on Wed May 10 04:16:31 2017. Dependencies resolved. ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Installing: kernel-core x86_64 4.10.14-100.fc24 updates 20 M kernel-devel x86_64 4.10.14-100.fc24 updates 11 M kernel-modules x86_64 4.10.14-100.fc24 updates 23 M kernel-modules-extra x86_64 4.10.14-100.fc24 updates 2.2 M Upgrading: batik noarch 1.8-9.fc24 updates 6.2 M batik-css noarch 1.8-9.fc24 updates 539 k ca-certificates noarch 2017.2.14-1.0.fc24 updates 484 k duplicity x86_64 0.7.12-2.fc24 updates 549 k ibus-typing-booster noarch 1.5.32-1.fc24 updates 4.0 M json-c i686 0.12.1-1.fc24 updates 30 k json-c x86_64 0.12.1-1.fc24 updates 29 k kernel-headers x86_64 4.10.14-100.fc24 updates 1.1 M pcre i686 8.40-7.fc24 updates 403 k pcre x86_64 8.40-7.fc24 updates 407 k pcre-devel x86_64 8.40-7.fc24 updates 545 k vim-common x86_64 2:8.0.586-1.fc24 updates 6.6 M vim-enhanced x86_64 2:8.0.586-1.fc24 updates 1.3 M vim-filesystem x86_64 2:8.0.586-1.fc24 updates 34 k vim-minimal x86_64 2:8.0.586-1.fc24 updates 520 k Removing: kernel-core x86_64 4.10.10-100.fc24 @updates 53 M kernel-devel x86_64 4.10.10-100.fc24 @updates 42 M kernel-modules x86_64 4.10.10-100.fc24 @updates 22 M kernel-modules-extra x86_64 4.10.10-100.fc24 @updates 2.0 M kmod-nvidia-4.10.10-100.fc24.x86_64 x86_64 1:375.39-2.fc24 @@commandline 18 M Skipping packages with conflicts: (add '--best --allowerasing' to command line to force their upgrade): google-noto-emoji-fonts noarch 20170426-1.fc24 updates 4.6 M
